CSGO. aahh what a classic.

CSGO is a classic shooter that i feel everyone should play atleast once. Personally it is a very difficult game to perfect and get good quickly with. expect many hours to be poured into it before even thinking about getting good.

THe most important thing to consider when purchasing/downloading is the great numver of cheaters. I feel this has completely ruined the matchmaking aspect of the game, with people without prime getting dominating by 3,4,5+ spinbotters/aim/wallers per game. In ranked expect there to be people cheating regularly every game and treat games without any cheaters as a privelege .

However these cheaters can be slightly combatted with the use of 3rd party matchmaking sites such as FaceIT or ESEA. However these sites are not new user friendly, and i would only reccomend playing if you are very confident in youre ability.

Overall 4/10. Too many cheaters, great game at high level though.

At first I played non prime... don't do that to yourself lol.
CS has been around for over 20 years and its just the perfect FPS. Nothing comes close. The nades, smokes, flashes, mechanics, teamwork etc is just perfect. CSGO is overall a great game and anyone who wants to take a game a bit more serious and play with active tryhards while being cuss at in russian but toxic players like the good old days of Call of duty... This is the game for you!
